This will refine prognostication and treatment planning.', 'molecular_profile': {'key_mutations': '**8. Biomarker Status:**', 'immunotherapy_markers': '**  Pembrolizumab, nivolumab, or other PD-1/PD-L1 inhibitors are strong candidates for either monotherapy or combination therapy.', 'other_markers': {'EGFR': '** Wild type – This excludes the use of EGFR tyrosine kinase inhibitors (TKIs) as a targeted therapy option.', 'ALK': '** No rearrangement – This excludes ALK inhibitors as a targeted therapy option.', 'ROS1': '** No rearrangement – This excludes ROS1 inhibitors as a targeted therapy option.', 'KRAS': '**  Sotorasib or adagrasib are the preferred first-line targeted therapies.'}}, 'therapeutic_implications': ['*10.
